thread.title: Cal Net Technology Group to Feature Industry-Leading Technology Companies at Premier Annual Event
thread.title_full: Cal Net Technology Group to Feature Industry-Leading Technology Companies at Premier Annual Event - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Cal Net Technology Group to Feature Industry-Leading Technology Companies at Premier Annual Event
text:
Cal Net Technology Group to host OktoberTek 2015 on Wednesday, October 28th at the Vertigo Event Center in Glendale, CA
Los Angeles, CA (PRWEB) October 16, 2015
Cal Net Technology Group, Southern California’s premier IT services provider, is pleased to announce its largest technology event of the year, “OktoberTek 2015 – Back to the Future of Technology.” The event will be held at the Vertigo Event Center in Glendale, California on October 28th, 2015 from 11:30 am – 5:00 pm and will feature more than 15 of the world’s leading technology companies including HP, EMC, Dell and Microsoft.
OktoberTek 2015 will present two engaging tracks as a part of the event’s Technology Expo with Track One focusing on Security and Track Two focusing on Cloud, Infrastructure and Managed Services.
“Managing Security, IT Infrastructure and Cloud technology options is mission critical for businesses today,” stated Brian Kreiner, Cal Net Technology Group Chief Executive Officer. “Our OktoberTek event provides business and IT professionals exposure to the latest information in the technology industry, equipping them with powerful knowledge and understanding to help them optimize business performance and produce desired outcomes.”
OktoberTek is a free event with lunch provided, a complimentary networking happy hour and the chance to win some great raffle prizes, Flat Screen TV’s and Tablets included.
Attendees will learn about new technology solutions direct from industry IT leaders including:
Cal Net Technology Group – Introducing the next generation of IT, Security solutions, Cloud, Infrastructure and Managed Services.
HP – Featured keynote speaker sharing information on the next generation of software, network and storage devices designed specifically with maximum security and performance in mind.
ShoreTel – Showcasing ShoreTel Connect, the company’s new hybrid cloud and on-premise unified communications solution.
Dell Security – Delivering the next generation of advanced security firewalls that are able to detect and protect against a multitude of threats on any device, regardless of its location.
ZixCorp – Presenting advanced email data protection products for networks and BYOD solutions, including advanced email encryption technology.
Datto – Offering the next generation of backup, disaster recovery and business continuity solutions.
To register for the event today, please visit http://www.OktoberTek.com .
About Cal Net Technology Group
Cal Net Technology Group is the premier provider of outsourced IT, cloud, security services and Unified Communications in the Southern California market, servicing organizations with 10-2000 employees. Through its implementation and support services, Cal Net Tech excels in tackling the complexities of partially and fully outsourced IT and voice systems implementation and support services with both onsite and remote delivery models.
Cal Net has also been recognized as a Dell Security Partner of the year for 2015, Southwest Region Partner of the Year by Microsoft three years in a row, including 2015, IT Service Partner of the Year by the Los Angeles Business Journal, has been named a top 50 Managed Services Provider in North America by the MSPMentor 501 List, is a CRN MSP Elite 150 list member and is a seven-time Inc. 5000 honoree.
Businesses interested in IT support or services can contact Cal Net Technology Group at (866) 999-2638, info(at)calnettech(dot)com or visit http://www.CalNetTech.com .
